TOP_TITLE_ATTANTION_TEXT: After making a payment, do not refresh or complete the page until the message «Transaction was successful» appears. If the account has not been activated automatically within 5 minutes, write to the support service.
TOP_TITLE_HASH: Send transaction hash for account activation
TOP_TITLE_ERROR_METAMASK: See short instructions to activate the package
TOP_TITLE_ERROR_WALLET_METAMASK: The wallet you are trying to connect to is already in use on another account.
TOP_DESCRIPTION_SORRY: SORRY! You cannot be ranked at this level. Please contact your sponsor and he will find a suitable place for you in the levels above. We wish you success in SMART-PROFIT!
